analysis: The project currently has a basic HTML structure with some CSS and JavaScript files. The theme needs to be updated to focus on black holes with animated objects and slides. The existing CSS and JavaScript files need to be enhanced to include cosmic-themed animations and interactive elements related to black holes.

Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented.
